language.entry: An crystalline alienage emerges from the farmstead that was created by the comet, roams in the surrounding regions...
The Crystalline Harbinger will now roam the Estate.
The Crystal Harbinger is lurking in this week!
The Crystal Harbinger is lurking in this week!
It's shells are hard as diamonds, wait for it's defenses to be lowered.
The Harbinger was created by the comet that struck the Farmstead.
It's claws oozes with crystal liquid that taint and damages heroes skin.
Harbinger reconstructs heralds to aid in battle and it polishes them.
{colour_start|crystal_trophy}Become one of us...{colour_end} No, stay away from me!
{colour_start|crystal_trophy}Destroy defected...{colour_end} Why would you do this!
{colour_start|crystal_trophy}Shatter...{colour_end} My shells are breaking apart from this thing!
{colour_start|crystal_trophy}The Comet calls...{colour_end} Why am I so afraid all of the sudden...
{colour_start|crystal_trophy}Shard gleams...{colour_end} Why is it looking at me like that...
{colour_start|crystal_trophy}Dispose crystals...{colour_end} This can't be, it really can't...
{colour_start|crystal_trophy}Return to shards...{colour_end} I never seen my shells shake like that...
{colour_start|crystal_trophy}Galaxy amoung stars...{colour_end} Was I really defect this time...
{colour_start|crystal_trophy}Your future ends...{colour_end} What about my future, what did it mean by that...
